howItWorks.title: How it works (3 steps)
howItWorks.step1Description: Tell us what you want (links, photos, details). We connect you with a shopper in Japan to confirm availability and options.
howItWorks.step2Description: We provide a quote (item cost + service fee) and payment instructions. Once paid, we agree on a time & place to pick up in the Great Vancouver area.
howItWorks.step3Description: Your shopper buys the item in Japan and brings it to BC. Meet at the confirmed spot—no international shipping.

pricing.question: How is total pricing calculated?
pricing.answer: Your quote includes the original item price (converted to CAD) plus our service fee.

serviceFee.question: How is the service fee calculated?
serviceFee.answer: There is a base service fee of $25, which may increase for large orders or requests involving multiple stores or categories.

restrictions.question: Are there any item restrictions?
restrictions.answer: Oversized items may not be accepted. Please inquire via the contact form or submit a request, and we'll confirm if we can accommodate your item.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We currently only accept Interac e-Transfer.

delivery.question: Do you do delivery?
delivery.answer: No, we arrange a time and place to meet up so we can hand off the items directly to you

meetup.question: Where and when do meets up happen?
meetup.answer: We'll coordinate via email to arrange a time and location that works for you. We recommend safe designated transaction areas offered by police stations, but malls and skytrain stations are also an option.

refunds.question: Do you offer refunds?
refunds.answer: Unfortunately, we do not offer refunds. All sales are final once payment is received.
